Author: MrSocialDisorder
Text: I bet you a nice, I bet you have nice things to talk about. I bet you had amazing adventures. If seems you are at a low point, life is not perfect. Sometimes you screw up. But things can change If needed.   If you need someone to listen I’m here.

Author: u-w-a
Text: I have stretch marks, my legs are huge, I am all bloated and horrible. I can’t believe I thought I was fat a few months ago and now I’ve put on even more weight, my collarbones have just been absorbed back into me. I’m probably amotional and irrational bc I’m due on my period but it can’t be that bad. there must be some truths in this shit. I hope I get fat shamed or someone comments on my weight irl because I haven’t felt red hot humiliation in a while and it will probably make me do something drastic that will actually help me in the long run
